image.description: Image to use for the container

pull.description: Pull the image even if it exists locally (implies --yes)

root.description: Launch with root privileges. Preferred way over 'sudo distrobox'

clone.description: Name of the distrobox container to use as base for a new container

home.description: Select a custom HOME directory for the container

volume.description: Additional volumes to add to the container

additional-flags.description: Additional flags to pass to the container manager command

additional-packages.description: Additional packages to install during initial container setup

init-hooks.description: Additional commands to execute at the end of container initialization

pre-init-hooks.description: Additional commands to execute at the start of container initialization

init.description: Use init system (like systemd) inside the container

nvidia.description: Try to integrate host's nVidia drivers in the guest

unshare-devsys.description: Do not share host devices and sysfs dirs from host

unshare-groups.description: Do not forward user's additional groups into the container

unshare-ipc.description: Do not share IPC namespace with host

unshare-netns.description: Do not share the net namespace with host

unshare-process.description: Do not share process namespace with host

unshare-all.description: Activate all the unshare flags below

no-entry.description: Do not generate a container entry in the application list

dry-run.description: Only print the container manager command generated

absolutely-disable-root-password-i-am-re.description: ⚠️ Skip user password setup when setting up a rootful distrobox, leaving it blank ⚠️
